title: Build a ChatGPT Style App for Your n8n AI Agents in MINUTES
description:
n8n is an incredibly powerful tool for building automations and AI agents without code. There is even a simple chat interface available to talk to the AI agents you create in n8n right within the workflow builder. However, this chat interface is VERY limited - there are almost no customization options and there is no way to view/resume old conversations.

It would be very nice if we had a full ChatGPT like interface to talk to our n8n agents and store all of our conversations...

Well in this video, that’s exactly what I show you how to do using Open WebUI! I’ll show you how easy it is to integrate your n8n AI agents with Open WebUI so you have a sleek frontend for your agents that you can set up in minutes. Plus I have resources to get you up and running with minimal effort.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Book a demo with Zams and see how it can transform your business with enterprise level AI agents & automation:

https://www.zams.com/demo?utm=787591

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

n8n Template Agent:

https://github.com/coleam00/ottomator-agents/tree/main/n8n-openwebui-agent

Open WebUI + n8n Pipeline: https://openwebui.com/f/coleam/n8n_pipe

Local AI Package: https://github.com/coleam00/local-ai-packaged

Open WebUI: https://github.com/open-webui/open-webui

n8n: https://n8n.io/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

00:00 - Introducing the n8n Agent UI with Open WebUI
02:02 - Demo of an n8n Agent in Open WebUI
03:06 - Game Plan for this Guide
04:05 - Open WebUI Intro & Installation
05:32 - Open WebUI with the Local AI Package
06:16 - n8n Function for Open WebUI
08:17 - n8n Function Config
09:07 - Zams
10:57 - Diving into the n8n Agent Template (Webhook First)
12:15 - Securing Our n8n Agent
14:52 - Inputs and Outputs for Our Agent
16:17 - Build Any n8n Agent for Open WebUI
17:11 - Understanding Open WebUI Metadata
21:28 - Outro

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Join me as I push the limits of what is possible with AI. I'll be uploading videos at least two times a week - Sundays and Wednesdays at 7:00 PM CDT!
